Package javelin.controller.db

Class Preferences

  • java.lang.Object
    • javelin.controller.db.Preferences
  • public class Preferences
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to read the file "preferences.properties". See the file "preferences.properties" for more details on standard options and this link for development options: https://github.com/tukkek/javelin/wiki/Development-options
    See Also:
    PreferencesScreen

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static boolean aicacheenabled
      If true will use AiCache.
      static boolean backup
      If true backups the game on initialization.
      static java.lang.String KEYCHECKPERFORMANCE
      Configuration file key for monitorperformance.

      Configuration file key for maxthreads.

      Key for tilesizeworld.
      static int maxmilisecondsthinking
      Max BattleAi thinking time.
      static java.lang.Integer maxtemperature
      In some system will prevent the CPU temperature from going above this value.
      static int maxthreads
      Thread limit for ThreadManager.
      static int messagewait
      Time to wait for Javelin.Delay.WAIT.
      static boolean monitorperformance
      If true ThreadManager will be self-monitoring.
      static java.lang.String player
      External audio player (command).
      static int saveinterval
      How often to save the game, in minutes.
      static java.lang.String textcolor
      Font color.
      static int tilesizebattle
      Tile size for BattleScreen.
      static int tilesizedungeons
      Tile size for DungeonScreen.
      static int tilesizeworld
      Tile size for WorldScreen.

    • Method Detail

      • getfile

        public static java.lang.String getfile()
        Returns:
        the entire text of the properties file.

      • savefile

        public static void savefile​(java.lang.String content)
        TODO would be better to have an option #setpreference(String key,String value) that would read the file, replace a line with the given key and save it in the proper order instead of forever appending to the file. It could be used in a few places this is being used instead.
        Parameters:
        content - Overwrite the properties file with this content and reloads all options.

      • write

        public static void write​(java.lang.String content,
                         java.lang.String f)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Parameters:
        content - Write content...
        f - to this file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • setup

        public static void setup()
        Initializes or reloads all preferences.

      • setoption

        public static void setoption​(java.lang.String key,
                             java.lang.Object value)
        Reads and writes to actual file.
        Parameters:
        key - Replaces the line with this option or creates a new line at the end of the properties file.
        value - Option value.
